resources.title: Learn To Code
resources.description: Link-rich resource to learn a new language. Good for beginners and those looking to expand their repertoire.

resources.title: GitHub Education Student Developer Pack
resources.description: Lots of free tools and discounts for students! Everything from DigitalOcean hosting credit (100$) to a free subscription to Unreal Engine 4.

resources.title: Learn Git Branching (Game)
resources.description: Great for those who are new to Git and for those that want to brush up.

resources.title: OverAPI
resources.description: A cheat sheet for different language and framework APIs, extremely useful as reference material during hackathons.

resources.title: The Little MongoDB Book
resources.description: Great read to get familiar with MongoDB
